casebody.data:
DRACHMAN, Respondent, v. NEW YORK & N. J. INV. CO., Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. April 25, 1894.) Appeal from first' district court. Action by Douis Drachman against the New York and New Jersey Investment Company.

Argued before BOOKSTAVER and BISCHOFF, JJ.

Fromme Bros., for appellant. T. A. Drachman, for respondent.

No opinion. Judgment affirmed, with costs.
